description:
I John‬ ‭2:21-23‬ ‭NKJV:‬‬ I have not written 📝 to you because you do not know the truth 🙌 but because you know it, and that no lie is of the truth. Who is a liar 🤥 but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist 👿 who denies the Father and the Son. Whoever denies the Son does not have the Father either; he who acknowledges the Son has the Father also. 👑✝️ .
.
.
